# epicMI

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

Estimate unreliability and MI scores for Infinium probes on the Illumina MethylationEPIC microarray v1.0, either using detP values or probes on the Y chromosome.

## Requirements

R >= 3.5.0 <br>
minfi >= 1.42.0 <br>
stringr


## Installation

``` r
if(!require(devtools)) install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("ChVav/epicMI")
```

## Example

``` r
library(epicMI)
out <- unreliability_MI_typeII(probesII_EPICv1, RGset)
```
